name: Voltic Speed
description:
This is Voltic Speed, our project intentions was to promote electric cars in a fun racing game (note that the cars do not actually exist and nor does the company we are promoting).

Playing this game you are going to crash, you are going to see some absurd driving but, you will have fun! 

The development team for this game are as follows:

-Cal Hilton = Project Manager, Programmer & Audio Designer

-Luke Dean = 3D Modeller & Level Designer

-Taylor Crawford = 3D Modeller & Animator

-Kirk Hogden = Programmer & UI Designer

When opening the zip please make sure to press "Voltic Speed Prototype.exe" to open the game (apologies for the lazy naming).
